item.title: Chia Seeds Recommended for Women to Keep Estrogen Levels Normal
item.description: Researchers at the German Cancer Research Center (DKFZ) have recently discovered that chia seeds may play a significant role in helping women maintain normal estrogen levels. This finding could have important implications for women’s health and wellness. Estrogen is a hormone that is crucial for the development and functioning of the female reproductive system . It also plays a key role in bone health, cognitive function, and cardiovascular health. When estrogen levels are too high or too low, it can lead to various health issues, including infertility, osteoporosis , and an increased risk of certain cancers.
